title: Update Aegis Sovereign application logo

requirements.text: Replace the existing Aegis Sovereign logo with a new logo design across all instances in the application including the landing page header, dashboard sidebar, PWA manifest icons, and favicon

quotes: Can u a change the logo

acceptanceCriteria: New logo appears in the landing page header navigation
New logo displays in the collapsed and expanded sidebar states in DashboardLayout
PWA manifest icons are updated with the new logo design
Logo maintains visual consistency across all screen sizes and contexts

constraints: Do not modify the DashboardLayout component structure beyond logo asset replacement
Maintain existing glassmorphism styling and layout positioning
Preserve PWA manifest structure and only update icon references
nonGoals: Redesigning the entire branding or color scheme
Changing the application name or tagline
Modifying navigation structure or sidebar functionality

required: Modern minimalist Aegis Sovereign logo featuring a shield with neural network pattern, designed for enterprise security software with clean lines and professional aesthetic suitable for tech applications (aegis-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Favicon version of the Aegis Sovereign logo optimized for small display at 32x32 pixels with high contrast and recognizable symbol (aegis-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
PWA app icon featuring the Aegis Sovereign logo on transparent or solid background optimized for mobile home screens at 192x192 pixels (aegis-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
High-resolution PWA app icon for high-DPI displays at 512x512 pixels (aegis-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
